category: Click Boards > Power management > Power Switch
name: mikroe.click.currentlimit10
short_description: Current Limit 10 Click is a compact add-on board representing a current-limiting solution for your application. This board features the HS2950P, a load protection HotSwitch from Semtech. It features a wide input voltage range of 2.7V up to 29V and can provide up to 5A output current. The HS2950P features an adjustable current limit, over-voltage protection, automatic output discharge, and soft start. It automatically restarts from all faults except OVP and UVLO.
